statusLine.command: input=$(cat); total_input=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_input_tokens // 0'); total_output=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_output_tokens // 0'); total_tokens=$((total_input + total_output)); if [ $total_tokens -ge 1000 ]; then token_display="$((total_tokens / 1000))K tokens"; else token_display="${total_tokens} tokens"; fi; remaining=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.remaining_percentage // empty'); context=""; [ -n "$remaining" ] && context=" | ${remaining}% remaining"; echo "$(whoami)@$(hostname -s) $(basename \"$(echo \"$input\" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')\") | $(echo \"$input\" | jq -r '.model.display_name') | ${token_display}${context}"
